        "0876d472f6b347a4b508ee002323ae91": {
          "id": "0876d472f6b347a4b508ee002323ae91",
          "stepType": "Prompt",
          "name": "Prior Authorization text",
          "prompt": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Prior authorization means getting approval before you can get access to medication or services. With prior authorization, your health plan agrees to help pay for the service (this is subject to any cost-sharing or other limitations) — and it’s important to know that ahead of time. "
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },

            "value": "",
            "mode": "simple"
          },

          "secure": false,
          "value": {
            "value": [
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": " You'll need an electronic referral from your primary care provider (PCP) before seeking services from another network provider. "
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": ""
                  }
                ]
              },
              {
                "type": "paragraph",
                "children": [
                  {
                    "text": "Most often, that means you have to contact your PCP before seeing a specialist."
                  }
                ]
              }
            ],
            "mode": "simple"
          },
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"

With prior authorization, your health plan agrees to help pay for the service (this is subject to any cost-sharing or other limitations) — and it’s important to know that ahead of time.
